Articles.Content:
An A-10 warthog I slapped together for fun.

Mods: 

B9 Aerospace

Kerbal Aircraft Expansion

BD Armoury

feel free to add ammo to the gau-8 and missiles.

Craft file:[https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=6348A53FE4D3B9B3!344&authkey=!AGvwiA0VVBxLVkg&ithint=file%2ccraft](https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=6348A53FE4D3B9B3!344&authkey=!AGvwiA0VVBxLVkg&ithint=file%2Ccraft)

Action Groups:

1:AirBrakes

2:APU Generator(for no reason whatsoever)

I'll make a refueler for it. Eventually.

this isn't very different from other hogs.

![dF5Wcsn.png](http://i.imgur.com/dF5Wcsn.png)

![zpyfdsh.png](http://i.imgur.com/zpyfdsh.png)

![canpxl1.png](http://i.imgur.com/canpxl1.png)

is that how you do it?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-14T12:04:10Z" title="04/14/2015 12:04  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 14, 2015</time> by Bill nye the rocket guy**
  
Forgot the craft file.

Welcome to the forums! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Always been a big fan of the Warthog myself, so I like to see other people making replicas of it -- especially when the creator has an eye for attention to detail. Nicely done!
Thank you! DCS gave me a huge part of the inspiration. what is sad is the fact that gear, which sticks out, isn't functional like the real one.
